author: dims
msg: [Performance] - Don't create an unnecessary string again, pass the byte array directly. Use ByteArrayDataSource with the byte array. Internally this avoids a lookup/load of DataContentHandler from the mailcap file as well. Please keep an eye out for breaking tests...
